import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-login", templateUrl: "./login.component.html", styleUrls: ["./login.component.scss"], }) export class LoginComponent { hidePassword = true; togglePasswordVisibility(): void { this.hidePassword = !this.hidePassword; } }
